Package com.fssa.projectprovision.service

Class MilestoneService

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.projectprovision.service.MilestoneService
public class MilestoneService extends Object
A service class that provides methods for managing milestones in the system. This class interacts with the MilestoneDAO to perform CRUD operations on milestones.
Author:
JayaprakashJaisankar

      public boolean insertMilestone(Milestone milestone) throws ServiceException
      Inserts a new milestone into the system.
      Parameters:
      milestone - The milestone to be inserted.
      Returns:
      True if the insertion is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's an issue with the service operation.

    • updateMilestone

      public boolean updateMilestone(Milestone milestone) throws ServiceException, DAOException
      Updates an existing milestone in the system.
      Parameters:
      milestone - The milestone to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's an issue with the service operation.
      DAOException - If there's an issue with the data access operation.

    • deleteMilestoneByTodoId

      public boolean deleteMilestoneByTodoId(int todoId) throws ServiceException, DAOException
      Deletes milestones associated with a specific todo by its ID.
      Parameters:
      todoId - The ID of the todo whose associated milestones will be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's an issue with the service operation.
      DAOException - If there's an issue with the data access operation.

    • getAllMilestones

      Throws:

      DAOException - If there's an issue with the data access operation.
